message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.PF 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper discusses fairness in resource allocation in distributed computer systems, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a quantitative measure for fairness and discrimination in resource allocation, which can be seen as a control problem in computer systems. 
3. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper introduces a new measure for fairness, which can be seen as a form of information theory. 
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses resource allocation in computer networks, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
5. cs.PF (Performance) - The paper discusses fairness as a performance criterion in resource allocation, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
